activities: We are a managed service provider that specializes in managing databases for our customers. In the course of our duties, we are granted access to PII.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Datavail is given access to our customers' systems that contain personal data for the purposes of database administration. We do not store, process or transmit such data.
recoursemech: Datavail Corporation will cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) as the independent recourse mechanisms through which Datavail will work to investigate any unresolved complaints.
